魂.definition: soul; spirit; immortal soul (that can be detached from the body)

魂不守舍.definition: to be preoccupied (idiom); to be inattentive; to be frightened out of one's mind

魂不附體.definition: lit. body and soul separated (idiom); fig. scared out of one's wits; beside oneself

魂牽夢縈.definition: (idiom) to miss very much; to yearn for

魂牽夢繞.definition: see 魂牽夢縈|魂牵梦萦[hun2qian1-meng4ying2]

魂飛魄散.definition: lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom); fig. to be frightened stiff; spooked out of one's mind; terror-stricken
